body_html:
@caisq, just pushed a commit to address the PyLint error. It's passing now. I wasn't aware of the TPU side of Estimator.

@xiejw I'm happy to follow your suggestion to long only a subset of the validation set. The usability issue is that e.g. with 50,000 validation images at a batch size of 128, we get 390 lines of logging, cutting that down to 39 lines would solve my usability issue. I'll go ahead and make that change if you confirm that's what we want.

body:
@caisq, just pushed a commit to address the PyLint error. It's passing now. I wasn't aware of the TPU side of Estimator.

@xiejw I'm happy to follow your suggestion to long only a subset of the validation set. The usability issue is that e.g. with 50,000 validation images at a batch size of 128, we get 390 lines of logging, cutting that down to 39 lines would solve my usability issue. I'll go ahead and make that change if you confirm that's what we want.
